comment._content:
This photo seems to be taken from the location of the present water reservoirs on Cliff Drive Katoomba. looking East across Frank Walford Park or  "The Guly" to the western facade of the Carrington Hotel, on top of the hill.
The road running across the middle background left to right is Murri Street.
The block building middle left is a block of flats built by J.B. North on the corner of Murri and Cascade Streets.
In the immediate foreground are the remains of the coal/oil shale loading staiths at the head of the tramway coming from the Katoomba Mines.
